divs: Sighting DetailsIt was a summer day partly clouded. I was basicaly in my late teens. Deliver newspapers at that time . I was neared finish delivering papers. Then I handed a custmener their paper. Then I looked in the sky. Boths of us saw what we thought was a jet fly low in the sky. But here was the strange thing a low flying jet would make a lound sound. This was silent and fast, I saw many low flying craft on that level and I could hear it lound and hear. What we saw was a long cylinder object with a spiral in the front. The color was a golden color. It's trail disappear almost quickly. We saw it race across the from east to west I think. We watched it about a minute or so . And hears the strangest thing I saw I high flying jet with a long trail. And I took much than the object to across and line of sight. Is sighting alway stuck in the back of mind even to today. I wish new why. Many years afterwood I try to understand and study on ufos, but I feel I'm still cluess about it!
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Attleboro
